title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Avoid needless conflicts by wisely choosing the battle youre courageously willing to fight. Some skirmishes arent worth engaging in because the stakes are too small. However, a false sense of entitlement can blind you to this fact today. A big, perpetually fearful ego will quibble with the ocean over losing a pebble to the tide. A need for control can make anyone a temporary tyrant. If you must clash over an important matter, you will be on a surer path to victory when you stand your ground more from a loving heart than a fearful mind. Humility is your friend. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
